message: All metadata fields for the indicator 16-6-3, translated into en
data: Goal 16. Promote the emergence of peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, ensure access to justice for all and build, at all levels, effective, accountable and inclusive institutions16.6 Build effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels16.6.3. Level of transparency and fairness in the recruitment and remuneration of civil servantsNot definedNot defined
